channel.title: How do I
channel.description: Change the level requirements to wear something? I need to change the level requirements for the D claws for example. I really need help with this!

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

Hmm, I’m not sure why this didn’t work.
I changed these:

String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws")
Also

public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("White", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws")
to this

String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("Dragon Claws")
and this

String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("White", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("Dragon Claws")

Read full topic

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If it starts with Dragon, def is automatically 60. If you add the dragon claws it will override that defence requirement

Read full topic

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

I understood that. How does adding something cancel the 60 defense requirement?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

No, you add it in wearing.

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

I want to change the 60 defence requirement to 60 attack. Whenever I search for “dragon claws” I don’t find anything btw. How does this work?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If you want to change the defence of dragon claws from 60 to 1 as most people do. In GetCLDefence Where you saw
if (ItemName2.startsWith(“claws”)
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“dagger”)
Add
|| ItemName2.startsWith(“Dragon claws”)

Read full topic

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

I do not understand. What do I have to do to change the Dragon claws bonus? [item id is 8002]
My wearing.java is like this…

public class Wearing { public String GetItemName(int ItemID) { for (int i = 0; i < server.itemHandler.MaxListedItems; i++) { if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[i] != null) { if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[i].itemId == ItemID) { return server.itemHandler.ItemList[i].itemName; } if (ItemID == -1) { return "Unarmed"; } } } return "!! NOT EXISTING ITEM !!! - ID:"+ItemID;
And also like this

		ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", "");

And like this…

if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger")
What do I do?

Read full topic
